creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: dark brown lacquer with inlaid mother-of-pearl; hinged cover; top has central longevity symbol flanked by two flying cranes and fruits on branches; front has pair of deer on right side and pair of cranes on left in a landscape with trees; left and right ends have fish with trees; back is plain; large floriform metal fitting with latch on front; blue paper at interior; lock included (no key)
title: Lacquer storage box with cranes, deer, and fish
